channel.title: Unable to mount SDcard (solved)
channel.description:
Hej, each time I enter card reader mode Axoloti recognized the card but lost the connection as soon as the card gets mounted from Windows meanwhile. And if I unmount the card after this no further action is possible (have to restart Axoloti for the same game). Automatic mounting is disabled in Windows. Any ideas?
Axoloti version : 1.0.12-2-0-g60a2f99 build time : 08/04/2018 20:20:07 CEST ... finished loading objects will disconnect, unmount sdcard to go back to normal mode (required to connect) Start uploading patch bin path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Axoloti\app\firmware\mounter\mounter_build\mounter.bin block uploaded @ 0x20011000 length 19328 Done uploading patch Start mounting sdcard... => SDCard mounter active, editor connection lost. Unmount/eject the sdcard volume in Explorer or Finder to enable editor connection again. <= Disconnect request mounting...

item.title: Unable to mount SDcard (solved)
item.dc:creator: @shellfish
item.description:
@shellfish wrote:

Hej,
each time I enter card reader mode Axoloti recognized the card but lost the connection as soon as the card gets mounted from Windows meanwhile. And if I unmount the card after this no further action is possible (have to restart Axoloti for the same game). Automatic mounting is disabled in Windows. Any ideas?
